Languages: Understands the languages of its creator but cannot speak

Traits.Name: Constructed Resilience
Traits.Content: The Concrete Golem has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned and is immune to disease.

Traits.Name: Magic Resistance
Traits.Content: The Concrete Golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Concrete Golem can make two attacks with its Primary Ability Attack.

Actions.Name: Primary Ability Attack
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

Actions.Name: Seismic Slam
Actions.Content: The Concrete Golem slams its massive fist into the ground, creating a shockwave. Each creature within a 15-foot radius must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or take 27 (6d8) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. On a successful save, they take half damage and are not knocked prone. This action can be used once every short rest.
